004
005package edu.wpi.first.math.jni;
006
007import edu.wpi.first.util.RuntimeLoader;
008import java.io.IOException;
009import java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicBoolean;
010
011/** StateSpaceUtil JNI. */
012public final class StateSpaceUtilJNI {
013  static boolean libraryLoaded = false;
014
015  static {
016    if (Helper.getExtractOnStaticLoad()) {
017      try {
018        RuntimeLoader.loadLibrary("wpimathjni");
019      } catch (Exception ex) {
020        ex.printStackTrace();
021        System.exit(1);
022      }
023      libraryLoaded = true;
024    }
025  }
026
027  /**
028   * Force load the library.
029   *
030   * @throws IOException If the library could not be loaded or found.
031   */
032  public static synchronized void forceLoad() throws IOException {
033    if (libraryLoaded) {
034      return;
035    }
036    RuntimeLoader.loadLibrary("wpimathjni");
037    libraryLoaded = true;
038  }
039
040  /**
041   * Returns true if (A, B) is a stabilizable pair.
042   *
043   * <p>(A, B) is stabilizable if and only if the uncontrollable eigenvalues of A, if any, have
044   * absolute values less than one, where an eigenvalue is uncontrollable if rank(lambda * I - A, B)
045   * &lt; n where n is the number of states.
046   *
047   * @param states the number of states of the system.
048   * @param inputs the number of inputs to the system.
049   * @param A System matrix.
050   * @param B Input matrix.
051   * @return If the system is stabilizable.
052   */
053  public static native boolean isStabilizable(int states, int inputs, double[] A, double[] B);
054
055  /** Sets whether JNI should be loaded in the static block. */
056  public static class Helper {
057    private static AtomicBoolean extractOnStaticLoad = new AtomicBoolean(true);
058
059    /**
060     * Returns true if the JNI should be loaded in the static block.
061     *
062     * @return True if the JNI should be loaded in the static block.
063     */
064    public static boolean getExtractOnStaticLoad() {
065      return extractOnStaticLoad.get();
066    }
067
068    /**
069     * Sets whether the JNI should be loaded in the static block.
070     *
071     * @param load Whether the JNI should be loaded in the static block.
072     */
073    public static void setExtractOnStaticLoad(boolean load) {
074      extractOnStaticLoad.set(load);
075    }
076
077    /** Utility class. */
078    private Helper() {}
079  }
080
081  /** Utility class. */
082  private StateSpaceUtilJNI() {}
083}
